description: This file defines a React functional component 'NoteDetails' that displays details of a note, including title and body, and provides buttons for editing and deleting the note. It also contains inline CSS styling specific to this component.

methods.name: NoteDetails({ note, onEdit, onDelete })
methods.description: React functional component that renders note details, edit and delete buttons, and applies inline styles.
